actions.title: AutoTag Paddle
actions.name: pdfix_autotag_paddle
actions.desc: Automatically tags PDF using Paddle and PDFix SDK

args.name: input_pdf
args.desc: Input PDF file

args.name: output_pdf
args.desc: Output PDF file

args.title: Paddle Layout Model
args.name: model
args.desc: Layout prediction model that Paddle should use

args.title: Rendering Zoom Level
args.name: zoom
args.desc: Pages are provided as images that are rendered using this zoom level

args.title: Process Formulas
args.name: process_formula
args.desc: Use Paddle Formula model to process formulas in the document

args.title: Process Tables
args.name: process_table
args.desc: Use Paddle Table models to process tables in the document

args.title: Threshold Paragraph Title
args.name: threshold_paragraph_title
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for paragraph title detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.3.

args.title: Threshold Image
args.name: threshold_image
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for image detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Text
args.name: threshold_text
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for text detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Number
args.name: threshold_number
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for number detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Abstract
args.name: threshold_abstract
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for abstract detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Content
args.name: threshold_content
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for content detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Figure Title
args.name: threshold_figure_title
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for figure title detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Formula
args.name: threshold_formula
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for formula detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.3.

args.title: Threshold Table
args.name: threshold_table
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for table detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Table Title
args.name: threshold_table_title
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for table title detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Reference
args.name: threshold_reference
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for reference detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Document Title
args.name: threshold_doc_title
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for document title detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Footnote
args.name: threshold_footnote
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for footnote detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Header
args.name: threshold_header
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for header detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.3.

args.title: Threshold Algorithm
args.name: threshold_algorithm
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for algorithm detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Footer
args.name: threshold_footer
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for footer detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Seal
args.name: threshold_seal
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for seal detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.3.

args.title: Threshold Chart Title
args.name: threshold_chart_title
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for chart title detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Chart
args.name: threshold_chart
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for chart detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Formula Number
args.name: threshold_formula_number
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for formula number detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

args.title: Threshold Header Image
args.name: threshold_header_image
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for header image detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.3.

args.title: Threshold Footer Image
args.name: threshold_footer_image
args.desc: Paddle layout model threshold for footer image detection. Number between 0.0 and 1.0. Default is 0.5.

actions.title: Generate MathML Paddle
actions.name: pdfix_generate_mathml_paddle_json
actions.desc: Automatically generates associate file for provided formula using Paddle

args.name: input_json
args.desc: Input JSON file with image data for formula

args.name: output_json
args.desc: Output JSON file containing alternate description for formula

actions.title: Generate MathMLs Paddle
actions.name: pdfix_generate_mathml_paddle_pdf
actions.desc: Automatically generates associate files for all formulas in PDF using Paddle

args.name: input_pdf
args.desc: Input PDF file

args.name: output_pdf
args.desc: Output PDF file

actions.title: Create Template Paddle
